title: [EMERGENCY] Cassiopeia - 1350RP SKIN? (: " When was the last time she had a skin eh?!?! "
body:
I noticed she doesn't own any 1350RP Skins and I happen to pass by this concept that I really liked.

http://img10.deviantart.net/f3be/i/2014/082/5/f/scorched_earth_cassiopeia_by_artsed-d7be6t6.jpg

Even tho I don't like the scorched earth title and prefer the Wildfire title it's still a pretty  awesome concept that has been going on for who knows how long  (:

http://lolskinconcepts.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/ginaNelson_lolWIP_011.jpg

I also saw this one which was beyond beautiful and I wanted to suggest this but then again it would be similar with Jade Fang :(

replies.body: Then again we also need a Yorick and Taric overhaul so I would keep this on the drawing board until then! It looks like a good idea though!

> [{quoted}](name=Mister Sunglow,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=g6QJr0dZ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-12T20:59:53.248+0000)
>
> Then again we also need a Yorick and Taric overhaul so I would keep this on the drawing board until then! It looks like a good idea though!

I actually wish they did a semi-visual upgrade with cass... generally I think Cass was worked terribly and is left alone just like Olaf.

I was hoping for a snowdown skin for her along the lines of 'skiing cobra cassiopeia' where she's gliding around with her tail on skis and her poisons are a snowblast and a sludge field, and her E makes her throw her ski sticks at the enemy
Buff her and I'll buy it.
Riot hates Cassiopeia in case you have not noticed yet.
